name: D/D/D Gust King Alexander
effectText:
1 "D/D" Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
If another "D/D" monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned to your field, while you control this card (except during the Damage Step): You can target 1 Level 4 or lower "D/D" monster in your GY; Special Summon it. You can only use this effect of "D/D/D Gust King Alexander" once per turn.
